Record.ClassificationPath: Disorders of Environmental Origin/Poisoning/Bites and Stings/Tick Toxicoses
Record.Description: Toxicoses caused by toxic substances secreted by the salivary glands of ticks; include tick paralysis (neurotropic toxin), sweating sickness (dermotropic toxin), and Rhipicephalus appendiculatus toxicosis (leukotropic toxin).
